oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Country Music Hall of Fame Medallion Ceremony - Alabama, DeFord Bailey, Glen Campbell - 2006-05-07 - Tape two of two.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Country Music Hall of Fame medallion ceremony held on May 7, 2006 from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame. Tape two of two. Honorees are Alabama, DeFord Bailey and Glen Campbell. Tape also includes brief program previously recorded with Vince Gill and Amy Grant at the end.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Lonestar (Musical group); Kyle Young; Sawyer Brown (Musical group); Kenny Chesney; Rascal Flatts (Musical group); Jo Walker-Meador; Francis Preston; Alabama (Musical group);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Recording begins in progress and continues from tape one (00:00) Comments from Lonestar and performance of Mountain Music (Lonestar) / (05:38) Young continues with the Alabama segment / (06:42) Introduction of Sawyer Brown / (07:20) Mark Miller with comments and performance of Dixieland Delight / (11:31) Young continues with the Alabama segment / (12:20) Introduction of Kenny Chesney / (12:43) Comments from Kenny Chesney and performance of Lady Down On Love (Kenny Chesney) / (20:30) Young continues with the Alabama segment / (21:10) Introduction of Rascal Flatts with comments and performance of My Home's In Alabama (Rascal Flatts) / (27:46) Young continues with the Alabama segment / (29:50) Introduction of Alabama business acquaintances, friends and family in attendance / (31:22) Introduction of Jo Walker-Meador and Francis Preston (32:01) Jo Walker-Meador with comments about Alabama / (34:23) Francis Preston with comments about Alabama /

(37:56) Francis Preston present medallion to Alabama / (40:25) Acceptance comments from Mark Herndon / (42:38) Acceptance comments from Teddy Gentry / (44:26) Acceptance comments from Jeff Cook / (45:17) Acceptance comments from Randy Owen / (58:39) Kyle Young introduces the sing along to Will The Circle Be Unbroken (Attendees) / (01:05:50) Program end / Previously recorded program (01:06:37) Excerpt of performance of The Next Big Thing (Vince Gill) / (01:07:30) Comments by and brief excerpt performance of Cry Me A River (Amy Grant)/ (01:11:14) TAPE END
